Posts.EditableText:
This is my game, Steven Universe: New Beginnings! It's a work in progress.

Steven Universe is a cartoon show. It's about a boy with magical alien friends who tries to make peace across the universe. He is friends with Garnet, Pearl, and Amethyst. Together, Steven and his friends are called the Crystal Gems!

This is my game. http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/tu-ceu4k5eqd0m0ztu7zya/steven-universe-the-beginnings

Posts.EditableText:
Hmmm, its a bit buggy? I cant fight the first fight
```
Error running script: Error compiling expression 'player.exp + 1': ArithmeticElement: Operation 'Add' is not defined for types 'Object' and 'Int32'
```
Posts.HTML:
Hmmm, its a bit buggy? I cant fight the first fight

Error running script: Error compiling expression 'player.exp + 1': ArithmeticElement: Operation 'Add' is not defined for types 'Object' and 'Int32'

Posts.EditableText: I fixed it. I just needed to add player.exp = 0 at the beginning. I republished the game.
Posts.HTML: I fixed it. I just needed to add player.exp = 0 at the beginning. I republished the game.

Posts.EditableText:
I made some changes.
1. Added new locations.
2. Changed the combat entirely.
3. Added teleportation.
4. Steven can level up now.

Game link here. http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/tu-ceu4k5eqd0m0ztu7zya/steven-universe-new-beginnings
